title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node CLI to list, pull and chat with Ollama models without leaving the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion backend for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI tasks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper that provides GenServer and OTP supervision for Ollama interactions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate with async tokio client for Ollama, including strong typing and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query Ollama models inside notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app with REST endpoints and admin UI for managing Ollama models and chats.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that proxies and extends Ollama with JWT auth, rate limits and OpenAPI docs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash commands and threaded conversations with local models.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama with model browser, chat history and GPU monitoring.
